video.title: Buying & Selling with The Property Brothers
video.synopsis: The Property Brothers, Jonathan and Drew Scott, team up to help homeowners get ready to sell their homes and purchase new ones.

episodes.synopsis: With three babies, Julie and Blake are hoping to find a spacious one-story property. But unless they update their house, they won't be going anywhere.
episodes.title: Julie and Blake

episodes.synopsis: Terri and Paul's sons were accepted to a prestigious school. But if they don't sell their home in time, they'll lose their hard-won spots.
episodes.title: Paul and Terri

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for more space, two busy parents renovate around their hectic schedule while searching for the perfect family home.
episodes.title: Janna and Michael

episodes.synopsis: A widowed father of five needs to downsize to a smaller home so he can afford to pay for his children's college tuition.
episodes.title: David

episodes.synopsis: With two kids under age 3, Jeremy and LaShelle have outgrown their starter home and are looking for a spacious suburban property.
episodes.title: Jeremy and LaShelle

episodes.synopsis: With two kids, a dog, a rabbit and a chicken, Cristal and Scott are struggling to keep up in their cluttered home and are desperate for more space.
episodes.title: Cristal and Scott

episodes.synopsis: A pair of quirky accountants are ready to move on, but their disheveled home is holding them back. Can Jonathan and Drew draft a plan for success?
episodes.title: Marie and Robert

episodes.synopsis: When Shane renovated his bachelor pad, he was a single dad. Now, he's married to Sydney, and they're looking for a place to expand their family.
episodes.title: Shane and Sydney

episodes.synopsis: A minor makeover turns into a major renovation for a busy couple looking for the perfect new family home. Can Jonathan and Drew help?
episodes.title: Halley and Justin

episodes.synopsis: A busy family with three kids can't wait to leave their crowded house behind. But their current space is in desperate need of a makeover.
episodes.title: Kristin and Craig

episodes.synopsis: New parents who bought the wrong house in the wrong neighborhood are now hoping to find a family-friendly home in a vibrant community.
episodes.title: Jenn and JP

episodes.synopsis: With two high-achieving daughters, Christi and Peter are urgently looking for a sprawling property in a great school district.
episodes.title: Christi and Peter

episodes.synopsis: Zane and Marie desperately need a bigger home. But unless they spruce up their charm-free property, they're going to have a hard time selling it.
episodes.title: Zane and Marie

episodes.synopsis: A couple needs to move to a larger home to accommodate their two active boys and their hockey equipment -- but must first live through a renovation.
episodes.title: Dan and Voula

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Jonathan help a family deal with the home that has belonged to them for generations but must now be sold to finance the parents' retirement.
episodes.title: Laurie and John

episodes.synopsis: Twelve years -- and three kids -- after they moved into their three-bedroom house, Gus and Denise need a place that fits their growing needs.
episodes.title: Gus and Denise

episodes.synopsis: Jonathan tackles a two-week renovation for a couple with four kids and two careers, but Drew finds it hard to turn up their dream property.
episodes.title: Stephanie and Chris

episodes.synopsis: Drew helps a couple with three active boys find a bigger place that will meet the family's budget and also include everything on their wish list.
episodes.title: Renee and Brent

episodes.synopsis: Drew helps a couple look for a home in an exclusive school district for their daughters, while Jonathan updates the house they want to sell.
episodes.title: Kathy and Michael

episodes.synopsis: Jonathan tackles bland interiors, a difficult layout and an unfavorable location as he helps a couple trade their starter home for a larger space.
episodes.title: Pearl and Folkert

episodes.synopsis: Six years after his wife's death, Ken and his daughter hope for a fresh start in a new family home with separate living areas for each.
episodes.title: Ken and Kimberly

episodes.synopsis: While Jonathan updates a starter home's drab interior, Drew searches for a place in the same area with room for a day care and a lawn care business.
episodes.title: Saira and Jesse

episodes.synopsis: While Drew seeks a property with room for a multigenerational family, Jonathan updates the kitchen and bathroom of their current home.
episodes.title: Daniel and Iris

episodes.synopsis: Jonathan and Drew help a childhood friend find a move-in ready house in a desirable school district, but balancing the budget proves difficult.
episodes.title: Travis and Carolyn

episodes.synopsis: In order to afford a property in a pricey new school district, a couple must renovate their current home and sell it for the best price.
episodes.title: Barry and Corrina

episodes.synopsis: Two schoolteachers want to move from their rundown house before the school year starts, but finances may force them to look outside their community.
episodes.title: Warren and Jill
